mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarm_receipt (JQNO,ALARM_TIME, DEPARTMENT, PHONE, VICTIM, ID, JURISDICTION,COMMUNITY, PCS, ADDRESS, CONTENT, TYPE, LOSS_MONEY, STOP_PAYMENT_MONEY, STOP_PAYMENT_ACCOUNT, STATE, JQNO) VALUES (#{jqno},#{alarmTime}, #{department}, #{phone}, #{victim}, #{id}, #{jurisdiction},#{community},#{pcs} #{address}, #{content}, #{type}, #{lossMoney}, #{stopPaymentMoney}, #{stopPaymentAccount}, #{state}, #{jqno})

INSERT IGNORE alarm_receipt (JQNO,ALARM_TIME, DEPARTMENT, PHONE, VICTIM, ID, JURISDICTION,COMMUNITY, PCS, ADDRESS, CONTENT, TYPE, LOSS_MONEY, STOP_PAYMENT_MONEY, STOP_PAYMENT_ACCOUNT, STATE) VALUES
( #{item.jqno},#{item.alarmTime}, #{item.department}, #{item.phone}, #{item.victim}, #{item.id}, #{item.jurisdiction},#{item.community},#{item.pcs},#{item.address}, #{item.content}, #{item.type}, #{item.lossMoney}, #{item.stopPaymentMoney},#{item.stopPaymentAccount}, #{item.state})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ALARM_TIME = VALUES(ALARM_TIME), DEPARTMENT = VALUES(DEPARTMENT), PHONE = VALUES(PHONE), VICTIM = VALUES(VICTIM), ID=VALUES(ID), JURISDICTION = VALUES(JURISDICTION), COMMUNITY = VALUES(COMMUNITY), PCS = VALUES(PCS), ADDRESS = VALUES(ADDRESS), CONTENT = VALUES(CONTENT), TYPE = VALUES(TYPE), LOSS_MONEY = VALUES(LOSS_MONEY), STOP_PAYMENT_MONEY = VALUES(STOP_PAYMENT_MONEY), STOP_PAYMENT_ACCOUNT = VALUES(STOP_PAYMENT_ACCOUNT), STATE = VALUES(STATE)
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ALARM_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') FROM alarm_receipt order by ALARM_TIME DESC LIMIT 1

select COUNT(*) AS value,type as name from alarm_receipt where DATE(alarm_time) BETWEEN #{alarmTimeStart,javaType = java.util.Date, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} AND #{alarmTimeEnd,javaType = java.util.Date, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY name ORDER BY value desc

select COUNT(*) AS value,community as name from alarm_receipt where DATE(alarm_time) BETWEEN #{alarmTimeStart,javaType = java.util.Date, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} AND #{alarmTimeEnd,javaType = java.util.Date, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} AND community!='未知' GROUP BY name ORDER BY value desc LIMIT 10

select COUNT(*) AS count ,SUM(loss_money) as loss_money,SUM(stop_payment_money) as stop_payment_money , SUM(stop_payment_account) as stop_payment_account,DATE(alarm_time) as date from alarm_receipt GROUP BY DATE(alarm_time) HAVING date BETWEEN #{alarmTimeStart,javaType = java.util.Date, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} AND #{alarmTimeEnd,javaType = java.util.Date, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} ORDER BY date
